content: BattleQuest: a fantasy RPG with co-op dungeons, level cap 60, featuring wizard, knight, rogue classes.
metadata: Released: 2025-01-10, dev lead: Alice Brown (DEV-1001), base price: $39.99

content: SkyRacer: arcade flight sim, multiplayer dogfights, jets & prop planes. Seasonal leaderboard resets.
metadata: Released: 2025-02-05, dev lead: Bob Chen (DEV-2001), base price: $29.99

content: CyberStrike: futuristic FPS with hacking mini-games, clan-based territory wars, microtransactions for skins.
metadata: Released: 2025-03-01, dev lead: Carol Lim (DEV-3002), base price: $49.99

content: CityCraft: sandbox building game, advanced terrain, resource management, mod support.
metadata: Released: 2025-02-20, dev lead: David Parker (DEV-4001), base price: $19.99

content: Tactical Legends: turn-based strategy with hero units, 2v2 or solo ranked ladder, expansions planned.
metadata: Released: 2025-03-15, dev lead: Emily Stone (DEV-5001), base price: $34.99
